lead_paragraph: Many video sites have been experimenting with a new format, HTML5, that may reduce an attitude that devices failing to support Adobe’s Flash technology are wanting.
snippet: Many video sites have been experimenting with a new format, HTML5, that may reduce an attitude that devices failing to support Adobe’s Flash technology are wanting.

headline.main: IPad Can’t Play Flash Video, but It May Not Matter
headline.seo: Complaints About the iPad’s Lack of Flash Support May Fade
headline.print_headline: IPad Can’t Play Flash Video, but It May Not Matter
